1.content: Design admin dashboard architecture and navigation structure
1.details: Plan the overall admin interface layout, navigation menu, role-based access controls, and dashboard overview with key metrics

2.details: Create interface to view, search, edit, suspend, and delete users (customers and restaurant owners). Include user activity logs, registration approval workflows, and bulk operations

3.details: Build tools to approve new restaurant applications, edit restaurant details, manage restaurant status (active/inactive), handle restaurant verification, and restaurant performance metrics

4.content: Create booking management and oversight system
4.details: Develop interface to view all bookings across the platform, handle booking disputes, manage cancellations/refunds, track booking patterns, and generate booking reports

5.details: Create system to review and moderate user reviews, social media posts, reported content, handle flagged content workflows, and maintain content quality standards

6.content: Develop system analytics and reporting dashboard
6.details: Build comprehensive analytics showing platform usage statistics, revenue analytics, user behavior insights, growth metrics, and customizable reporting tools

7.content: Implement customer support and communication tools
7.details: Create support ticket management system, direct messaging with users, FAQ management, announcement system, and support analytics

8.details: Build audit logs, security monitoring dashboard, compliance reporting, data privacy tools, and admin activity tracking
